programme.title: Bicentennial year
programme.short_synopsis: Enter the year of the Bicentennial Burger.
programme.medium_synopsis: Bicentennial year in the land of unbounded commercial opportunity.
programme.long_synopsis:
Bicentennial year in the land of unbounded commercial opportunity.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
